title: Pixel Buds connected to Win10. Skype for Business and Screencast-o-matic claims no mic
content:
Just like the title says. I can connect to Windows 10 on this Intel Skull Canyon NUC just fine. I hear music and videos just fine. Sound settings claim I have a headset:
Headset
Pixel Buds Hands-Free
Default Device

Picture of a headset/mic, big green check mark. No other device listed, the little soundbar on the right side never shows any activity. 

How do I get the microphone in my Pixel Buds to work with Windows 10?
